content: in this legal case the court of torre annunziata has made a final ruling after a 10year duration the court has declared certain individuals as default and has identified the heirs of the deceased the court has assigned certain properties to some of the heirs and ordered payments to be made to all of them the court has also distributed the remaining balance among the coheirs the legal principles applied in this case are found in the civil code the court ruling declares certain individuals in default confirms the open succession of the deceased identifies the heirs assigns properties orders payments and determines the costs of the proceedings the ruling was made on june 26 2019 and filed in the clerks office on june 27 2019

metadata.CASE_ID: Tribunale Torre Annunziata sez. II, 27/06/2019, n.1639
